Population: Adults receiving BMT/SCT after conditioning for haematological cancers
Outcome: Oral mucositis (moderate + severe) (BMT/SCT after conditioning for haematological cancers)
Reasons for GRADE if not High: Downgraded by 1 level for inconsistency (substantial heterogeneity: I2 = 50% to 90%, P < 0.1); downgraded 1 further level for publication bias as there are 2 references in Studies awaiting classification that would be included in the conditioning/transplant subgroup, but the data are not available (NCT02313792; Spielberger 2001).
